appsource_app.name: appsource_app
appsource_app.sql: select distinct doc.fullName, doc.title from XWikiDocument doc where doc.xWikiClassXML<>'' or doc.fullName = 'Blog.BlogPostClass'

source.name: source
source.sql: select obj.name, doc.title from XWikiDocument doc, BaseObject obj where doc.fullName = obj.name and obj.className='TotemCode.SimpleTotemItemClass' and doc.name != 'SimpleTotemItemTemplate'

type.name: type
type.sql: select obj.name, providedType.value from BaseObject obj, StringProperty providedType where obj.className = 'DisplayerCode.DisplayerSheetClass' and obj.id = providedType.id.id and providedType.id.name='providedType'
